root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 16-4-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: Available nationally and by weapon type ([MDNAC: Weapons, Grenades, Cartridges, Bombs]; [MSPGC: Weapons, Grénades, Cartridges, Bombs])
Disponible au niveau national et par type d'arme ([MDNAC: Armes, Grénades, Cartouches, Bombes]; [MSPGC: Armes, Grénades, Cartouches, Bombes])
